meanings.sent1: I haven't seen her in yonks.
meanings.sent2: We waited for yonks for the bus to arrive.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise took yonks to finish the race.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had been standing there for yonks.
meanings.sent5: The treasure had been buried for yonks before it was found.

meanings.sent1: In yonks past, people used to travel by horse and carriage.
meanings.sent2: Yonks ago, dinosaurs roamed the earth.
meanings.sent3: The ancient ruins have been there since yonks.
meanings.sent4: Legends from yonks ago still captivate us today.
meanings.sent5: Yonks ago, the world was a very different place.

meanings.definition: A long time in the future
meanings.sent1: We'll have flying cars in yonks.
meanings.sent2: Yonks from now, people might live on Mars.
meanings.sent3: It will take yonks for technology to advance that far.
meanings.sent4: Yonks ahead, our descendants will look back at us.
meanings.sent5: Yonks into the future, humanity may have solved many mysteries.
